code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant App as App Cliente (Offline)
    participant OS as Offline Sync Service
    participant DB as DB OfflineSync
    participant EB as Event Bus
    participant Core as Servicios Core

    App->>App: Generar UUID unico
    App->>App: Guardar en cache local

    App->>OS: SubmitBatch(transacciones[])

    loop Para cada transaccion
        OS->>DB: Verificar IdempotencyKey
        alt UUID nuevo
            DB-->>OS: UUID valido
            OS->>DB: Guardar UUID + timestamp
            OS->>EB: Publicar eventos
            EB-->>Core: Procesar eventos
            Core-->>OS: Procesado
        else UUID duplicado
            DB-->>OS: UUID duplicado
            OS->>OS: Log conflicto
            OS-->>App: ConflictDetected
        end
    end

    OS-->>App: Resultado final: aplicadas vs conflictos
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
